text:

text:
Mai toh pehle dekhte hi samjh gaya tha B6 me , naam and shakal dekh ke , iss bande ke sath meri bht banegi .
 I am really thankful that you came into my life at the times that were so harsh for me. I really didn't expect it man!! Thankyou so much for supporting me , staying with me , caring for me .. I would never forget that and man it makes me senti remembering those times. 
You are one of the sweetest guys in IITK and such a cutie bhai <3. 
Hum log ne kitne baat kari , kitni videos dekhi room pe , kya toh logo pe discussions kiye ! haha. All the memories with you are full of love and care and i am so happy that i could know you. 
This is not a bye! and bhai please don't ever loose touch with me <3 (if by mistake we loose touch , fucking call me!! you bitch!)

Waiting for a trip with you , siddy and nandu bhai <3
*tight_hug*
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
Definitely one of the people I admire in y17 (and i am sure they are less than 5) despite your *extremely* bad hygiene . 
OMG this gonna contain so much simping senpai (XD XD XD XD)
Bhai , aap toh un logo me se ho jinke kisse hote hai institute me , - " bhai asli senior toh Alan the, unhone nashe bhi kiye , maal bhi phuka , padai me bhi bakchod , maggu personilty bhi nahi the , har jagah active bhi the " .  Man i was so impressed by you ki kitna sab easy lagta tujhe dekh ke , itne ache se krte the tum chezze (obviously talking about only kuch cheeze - casually reminding of poor hygiene).But pata hai real connection started when we talked about relationships , happiness , sometimes interesting books , conventional entertainment and what not! Conversations with you always been so fun , deep , unconventional. Man really liked the time spent with you . Today also i enjoy talking with you , exchanging ideas about life's rarely touched aspects and what not. 

At the end i wanna say you are a beautiful human being and you'll be prettier <3  
I wish hum milte rahe jab hum same state me ho ,calls se touch me rahe. 
Great things are waiting for you 
Love you man ( #no_homo XD )
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:

You told me your problems , i am so glad i was there to listen and support you! and you were there with me to support me always !! Abhi kitne aur baate share karni hai ! looking forward to beautiful relationship and hum dono toh touch me rahenge hi! all the best for future endeavors and love you bro!

text:
Hello , Robo club partner!! Oh man i have tried for that line follower competition since 1st year but saala jeeta nahi! But you know what! I actually won! I won a great team mate with whom i can work and enjoy! The person i so easy to work with and shows the equal amount of hard work , dedication , team spirit and sometimes even more! I must say Neil , you were an excellent team mate !! I cannot forget how we pushed ourselves on last nights to work for that competition ! We set a new level in small robotics in roboclub by making a full beautiful cad and setting that robot so beautifully. You might not know , but that was actually a great robot ! and it was all possible because i had you! You also tried to support me in my tough times which i can never forget! Thanks for all the support and care Neil! 
Hum log agar same cities me honge toh pakka milenge ! This is not a bye! 
All the best for future endeavors and IITK ka naam roshan karna bro <3
*Tight hugs*
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
There cant be a person who is very good in acads , stays active in clubs , be in a fest's core team and does politics. 
Shibalik : Hold my beer!

Man you really have some great achievements. You always motivated me to do better in so many aspects of my life and it might not look that you are a softie but i know for sure you are! you respect everyone's emotional health! You might look being tough on juniors but i know you care about people and know limits very well ! Shibalik you really are an all - rounder! We did Robocon together in summers , it was so fun man!! the most epic memory is that - "Chill hai sholder kardenge" XD , we gonna laught at this whenever we see that guy who spoke these epic words. Then you came when i was not expecting you , I always wanted you to be a part of Robocon and then you finally came! What a relaxation man! You and Suyash literally were the strongest pillars of the team. You were the guys i knew i can totally rely! It was so so much fun working with you and our journey did not end after completion of Robocon but an amazing , fun friendship grew in which you used to me what shit is going in campus. Loved to hear those stories , hahaha!! Modern Physics lab me bhi bakchodi kari sath me! Hoping for reunion party of robocon, let's see Corona ka scene ! Lots of love man !!
Thanks for making my stay awesome and fun!
*Hugs* 
All the best for future endeavors , i know you gonna achieve all your dreams!
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:

Hoping to see you soon!!!!!! <3 <3

text:

Aapke liye wish karta hu ki aap jaldi se apne dreams achieve karlo and fir badi party karenge sath me aapke ghar aake! Sid, akhilesh , teri and meri trip rehgyi hai! text:
Bhai Nitik yaar! Kya toh mitr ho aap humare <3 . I know i dont need to write this but i am writing this to make you feel how special you are to me ! 
First year me bhai Robowars me sath me kaam ! and bc mai koi ghamand me nahi tha, mujhe sahi me jo aata tha mai sikha raha tha! Bhai but Robowars IITK ke highlights me se hai meri zindagi me! Itna zyada fun kiya hai ! Pech kasna , sheet  kaatna , roboclub saaf karna , apni road trips , ganga behraj photoshoot ! bhai there are countless memories with you man! Then came second year after i which i didnt treat you guys like you deserved! Still you always came to help me! Even when i suddenly called you at 3 that i am having anxiety  ,you left all and came to the hall ! Man i cannot imagine IITk without you ! canteen me khana , mere room pe bakchodi , meri wing can be called your second wing of IITK !! You were always there when i needed you! Always! I know how much you care about friends ! I know how you share your respect , love and support . You are an absolute GEM. Btw , not only me IITK is also thankful to you for enormous contribution to various departments and clubs here! Campus me toh sath me hi rahenge and dekhiyo marath anthem gaane ko bolenge XD, An BC is baar tere account me likh ke khaye karunga XD
Lots lots lots of love man <3

Thankyou so much man for everything. Obviously this is not a bye , we will be in regular touch life long. I know abhi toh hume aage kaafi sahi sahi memories banani hai! looking forward to a beautiful relationship <3. and i wish you a happy , fun , loving and successful life
*Tight hugs*

text:

text:
Hey bro ,the first thing that comes in my mind when i think about you is "underrated".
You have been there for me whenever i needed you! You always have been caring, sweet and supporting <3. I am eagerly waiting to go to that trip and listen to all your stories!
Ugghh I miss you bitch , hoping to see you soon and have lots of fun togther
Dono bhaiyo ki dual hai toh sath me hi rahenge , sath me hi khana peena hai toh this is obviously not bye!
Lots of love man 
*All the best for future* type long ass messages , yk what i wanna say

One of the most beautiful lines you said - "It is life and we have to make best of it", thanks for sharing such amazing ideas!!
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
Dekho bhai , tere mere pe koi kitne bhi memoirs daalde but ek category jo abse alag stand out karti hai voh roomies ki . Mera isse pehle koi bhi roomie nahi tha (hostel me nahi rha tha na mai) , You first me fucking first roommate . Bhai pehli baar dekha tha na toh full on gaand phat gayi rhi ki yeh toh bc giant hai  ,yeh gaand maar dega but fir jab maine tumarha baat karne ka style suna toh i was like yeh toh bhai full on softy hai! But no MC i was wrong , bhai shivansh kya MC vaali harkate kari hai tune , BUT BUT BUT all just changed so much when you came into Nandu's and my room and said "Sorry" , Man it was so emtional to me!! I realised the amazing change which occurred in you! You became such an amazing person , helping people , staying in their bad times. You became the person with whom i can be comfortable with, to whom i can share stuff! 
If i talk about some fun memories toh then i would mention about C6 ka MKB karna , bhai and kya be bhoot banke baith gyaa tha beech me , saale chapal khali batao uss din , hadh hai bhai!  
Your mango treats were so amazing <3. I know you are preparing hard for UPSC and i am sure you gonna become (obviously because you are hard working , true to yourself and regular) , but you have already earned my respect and love bruh! You will definitely be missed and agar same cities me honge toh pakka milenge bro <3 and obviously mere dil me humesha tere liye ek special jagah rahegi
Lots of love 
*Tight hugs*
author: Abhishek  Saini

author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
OMG! man reading your memoirs, bhai itni khubsoorat hindi toh nahi likh sakta mai! But I know humari memories khubsoorat hai! yaar jab humne PHY ki lab start kari thi , toh pehle toh laga tha ki kya badi baat hai, itna sahi senior mil gaya but aage kya hua we both know XD XD . Bhai bht maze kiye hai yaar uss lab me ! i would say best fun PHY course experience usi ka raha hai XD . Bhai aaj bhi apna mixture of ultimate fraudy days and super serious mode yaad hai ! And kya toh lab manager (I cant remeber his name) se rishtey banaliye the , full late humari cheeze accept karlete the XD . And fir pata chala aap toh HSS me kaafi chapu ho ! toh bhai impress hi kardiya aapne !
Jab bhi tere se baat kari humesha fun , exciting vibes aayi! Stay this fun and I wish you all the best for future endeavors. Kabhi same city me honge toh pakka milnege ! and phone number toh hai hi , padke yaad aaye toh bc call kardena \,,/

Lots of love  
*Hugs*
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
OMG ! so excited to write this!! (Y17 crush bhai <3 ho aap toh)
Bhai pehle baar tum and akhilesh mile the na toh i was like - Kya yahi pyaar hai ? XD XD

Bhai tere sath toh countless memories hai yaar and voh bhi itni fun ke sath. Apparently starting me toh mujhe hi pata tha tu kitna bada harami hai , bc kitna politics khelta hai but so glad you left that path at early stage . Infact you , me and nandu left that path for our betterment! Bhai odyssey , mini miltia , Yellow and brownie (XD XP) (legends of B6 hahaha) , Ramaiya ka khana (mujhe hotel and ek ramaiya jaise jagah ka naam yaad nahi aarha toh ramiya hi likh diya) , your birthday tradition of you running away in campus from GPL - "because rivaz hai !!" XD, bhai kya toh simp kiya hai humne kuch seniors and kya toh bezatti bhi kari hai <3. Really IITK would feel incomplete without you. My man , my bruh !! 

Ab toh mai wait kar raha hu apne discussion on marriages of every wingie , ki kiske bache kiske bacho ki maarenge XD xD.

I wish tu achieve kare what you want and fir hum log ek bht achi trip pe jaayenege , akhilesh and  nandu bhi

Lots of love man!! Lots of love !! *hugs*
Regular Touch me rahenge <3
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
such a cutie of our wing <3. Bhai you are so so cute , you talk so sweetly , help whenever i asked you <3. And man Thanks for your sony speaker ! you know ek din urgency me maanga tha , and bht bht bht bht zyada sahi kaam aaya tha <3 (you know i know ). Yaar mera favourite hangout spots voh hote hai college me jisme MC/Selfish bache na ho , and tumarha room unhi me se hai! Itni wholesome vibes aati thi tumarhe sath hangout karne se! Kitne intimate jokes bhi hai apan dono me XD XD. and bhai kya toh Gawd level shit kari hai aapke sath! Thanks for being you! ALl the best for future! Hum dono same cities me honge toh pkka milenge , stay in touch ! 
*Tight hugs*
author: Abhishek  Saini

text: Man! Suds bhai aap toh sahi me bht machau ho!Itni saari deep topics pe baat hui hai apan dono ki , halaki fir tumne bataya mujhe ki tumarhi har kisi se deep topics pe conversation hui hai. I remember kaise puri raat tumne mujhe apna naya internet ka idea pitch kiya tha (That was amazing). Mai tumse kabhi kabhi book lene aata tha read karne ke liye and mai read hi nahi karpaata tha XD. Tumne life ki kuch important lessons bhi diye and i think you are the really who is really doing things bina kisi duniya ke tension ke!! Whenever we were together , i had fun with you , I am still surprised by your extreme focus and concentration time! All the best for future and obviously bro abhi toh Among us ke rounds bache hai kaafi! and Reunion hoga toh mafia khelenge pakka and muje kisi ne humesha ki tarah pehli baari me bahar kiya toh mai chodunga nahi use XD XD   <3
author: Abhishek  Saini

text:
Hey man your bio so great that i cant even understand it in at first glance so don't expect me to write some great words. What you can expect is chessy lines , constant SIMPing , admiration and lots of love!!

You are one of my Y17 crushes and just like a crush you don't give any bhav to me!! Hahaha but it's true !! X ( . Anyways , Robocon without you can't be imagined , Initially i thought i had to push everything myself , but never expected such a beautiful surprise from y17, you were with me in the times i never expected someone to be with me , And that selfie of submitting proposal together is really special for me ! Man you helped me so so much! I remember all the days , how we were working on facebook page , website and all the sessions we had to take ! Robocon was so much fun with you ! It gave me life's most important lessons and i hope you learnt a lot too! I am forever waiting for Team Robocon reunion! ughh!! and hand out hoodies! but i think ab toh sabke ghar parcel hi karna padega! XD XD . I am so glad you were there in my life , supported me and pushed yourself so much !!!! Thankyou Suyash so much ! I am sure agar hum common cities me honge toh pakka milenge kisi meal pe ! gonna miss you so much man !
I am sure you gonna achieve whatever you want in life !! so all the best for the beautiful journey ahead!! Lots of love (not just for saying , i really mean from my heart , lots of love for you <3)
*Tight hugs*
author: Abhishek  Saini

text: Hey Man, glad that we worked on a common project , had great fun with you in mechatronics along with others ! Will never forget constant bitching about you know who (S****)!! Hahah , All the best for future endeavors!
